info.title: udsaes/dwd_forecast_service
info.description: dwd_forecast_service provides an API to query weather data that has previously been downloaded by dwd_data_crawler from opendata.dwd.de (free service offered by [DWD](https://www.dwd.de/EN/ourservices/opendata/opendata.html)).

get.summary: Get a COSMO-D2 forecast for a given reference timestamp, a given value of interest and a given location

parameters.name: referenceTimestamp
parameters.description: The reference timestamp as UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution that shall be provided

parameters.name: voi
parameters.description: The value of interest for which the forecast shall be provided

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the location in [decimal degrees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees)

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude of the location in [decimal degrees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees)

200.description: The requested forecast data which is based on the closest grid point in the COSMIX model for the given location (latitude and longitude

get.summary: Get a MOSMIX forecast for a given reference timestamp, at a given station for a given value of interest

parameters.name: referenceTimestamp
parameters.description: The reference timestamp as UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution that shall be provided

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The id of the weather station

parameters.name: voi
parameters.description: The value of interest for which the forecast shall be provided

get.summary: Get actual reported weather data at a given station for, for given value of interest within a given time interval

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The id of the weather station

parameters.name: voi
parameters.description: The value of interest for which the forecast shall be provided

parameters.name: startTimestamp
parameters.description: The inclusive start timestamp for the queried timeseries in UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution. If not value is given, the current timestamp minus 25 hours is used.

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.description: he exclusive end timestamp for the queried timeseries in UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution. If no value is given, the current timestamp is used.

get.summary: Get the newest 27 h forecast for the given point of interest

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

get.summary: Get the newest 45 h forecast for the given point of interest

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

get.summary: Get the newest 24 h measurement data for point of interest

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

get.summary: Get the list of defined points of interest

id.description: The identifier of the point of interest (uuid v4 string)

name.description: The clear text name of the point of interest (should NOT be used as identifier)

enum: Data basis: Deutscher Wetterdienst, own elements added

location.description: the location the measurements refer to

poi.description: the identifier of the point of interest

measurements.description: the actual measurement values as an array of timeseries

poi.description: the identifier of the point of interest

unit.description: Unit of the data, formatted as defined in the [Modelica Specification v3.4](https://www.modelica.org/documents/ModelicaSpec34.pdf), Chapter 19.

value.description: the value of the timeseries at the timestamp (unit as specified above)
